A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This is an objectively bad\, at times ridiculous\, movie. Those giving it positive reviews seem to:
1) Be shilling for Disney\, or
2) Believe it somehow validates their political views\, or
3) Most tragically\, be otherwise good people who are suffering the Phantom Menace syndrome\, trying to convince themselves that this wasn't awful.

The arrogance of Rian Johnson is astounding. He trashed everything that came before him in one of the most beloved entertainment franchises of the last 40 years. And this guy hadn't exactly established himself as a visionary titan who had earned the right beforehand.

This will age even worse than the Prequels.
